MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

English.Char_Desc_45: Rapid development framework for Web Java Apps
English.Char_Desc_80: LazyJ is a rapid development framework for Java-based WEB applications.
English.Char_Desc_250: LazyJ is a rapid development framework for Java-based WEB applications. It includes a very fast template engine, page caching and data caching, database wrapper with connection pooling, database-backed sessions, time-bounded servlet execution.
English.Char_Desc_450: LazyJ is a rapid development framework for Java-based WEB applications. It includes, a very fast template engine, page caching and data caching, database wrapper with connection pooling, database-backed sessions, time-bounded servlet execution, easy file uploading, notifications framework (email and Yahoo! Messenger included) and many other nice features.
English.Char_Desc_2000: LazyJ is a rapid development framework for Java-based WEB applications. It includes, a very fast template engine, page caching and data caching, database wrapper with connection pooling, database-backed sessions, time-bounded servlet execution, easy file uploading from servlets or JSPs, notifications framework (email and Yahoo! Messenger included) and many other nice features.
